means: （尤指书面）证明( certify的过去式 )
颁发（或授予）专业合格证书

sentence.Network_en: All three doctors are certified as addictions specialists.
sentence.Network_cn: 3个医生都是持有执业证书的瘾症专家。
银行在支票上标有“保付”的字样。
辛普森夫人被证实已经死亡。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2.没有经过认证（Certified）的副本（如正式的印章及授权的署名）。　3.公司相关联络人对申请指南了解不足。
enhancing the independence of certified tax agents to promote the development of tax attestation ., 注册税务师独立性与涉税鉴证业务发展.
《疯狂英语2003合集全部文本》（一） ... ) inventory n. 详细目录，存货 ) certified a. 被鉴定的 ) scour v. 急速走遍.
汽车专业英语词汇翻译(C-D) ... Centreplane of occupant 乘员中心面 Certified 经认证的 Cetane number 十六烷值.

list.abs: 农作物种子标签通则 ... 药剂处理种子 treated seed 认证种子 certified seed 转基因种子 genetically modified seed.
支票_百度百科 ... 不记名支票（ Cheque payable to bearer） 保付支票（certified cheque）（ Certified Cheque） 现金支票（ cash Cheque）.
常用英语单词和词组大全 ... certificate 证明 Certified Invoice 证实发票 change 变化,变换.
常用法律英语词汇注解4 ... ♦Caution 警诫词 ♦Certified Copy 核证副本 ♦Chamber 办公室.

entry.def: If someone in an official position certifies something, they officially state that it is true.

example.ex: ...if the president certified that the project would receive at least $650m from overseas sources...
example.tran: 如果总统证明这个工程将获得至少6.5亿美元的海外资金

example.ex: The National Election Council is supposed to certify the results of the election...
example.tran: 全国选举委员会应对选举结果出具证明。

entry.tran: 给…颁发合格（或结业）证书
entry.def: If someone is certified as a particular kind of worker, they are given a certificate stating that they have successfully completed a course of training in their profession.

example.ex: They wanted to get certified as divers.
example.tran: 他们想拿到潜水员资格证。

means.word_mean: 1. endorsed authoritatively as having met certain requirements;
2. having quality or payment or delivery guaranteed;
3. fit to be certified as insane (and treated accordingly)
4. holding appropriate documentation and officially on record as qualified to perform a specified function or practice a specified skill;

auth_sentence.content: Once certified, there's no shortage of work.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once certified, there's no shortage of work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once certified, there's no shortage of work.

auth_sentence.content: Our IQ test results are on our certified transcripts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our IQ test results are on our certified transcripts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our IQ test results are on our certified transcripts.

auth_sentence.content: Under federal law, that certified count is conclusive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Under federal law, that certified count is conclusive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Under federal law, that certified count is conclusive.
